column5: hello to every one, I'm new to this all, please bare with me, and if you can help out, great!  a friend and I are taking my boat up to Nanticoke , just beside port dover, on lake Erie this Sunday. I know when bass season  is in, its the hot spot. I'm not to sure about this time a year, actually, thats an  understatement. I have NO idea this time of year. any tips or advise would be great.  we are launching @  Hoover Marina.  who can help me???
the silver bass should be in by now .. throw silver spinners .. jigs or minnows under a float ... and post a report with pics when you get back
thanks...  any one been there  and had any luck this year?
and il be sure to update you all with a report sunday night!

The silver bass will no doubt be in and will hit just about anything.  You will also liely hook into a few OOS incidental smallmouth and some sheephead.  With the weather forecast, you should have a great day.  Cheers  Craig
This web site has a some guys fishing there and its slow. http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/default.asp?CAT_ID=1  Jeff
